amendment.description: To set aside funds for the Chicago Ship and Sanitary Canal, Illinois.

action.text: Amendment SA 128 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S1412-1416; text: CR S1414) To set aside funds for the Chicago Ship and Sanitary Canal, Illinois.
